## flatten variable

Flattens descendants of a given `node`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
flatten: ({ node, descend }: FlattenParams) => NodeWithPosition[]
```

## Remarks

It doesn't descend into a node when descend argument is `false` (defaults to `true`<!-- -->).

```ts
const children = flatten(node);

```
